thread.title: 4th stay - just as good as the others
thread.title_full: 4th stay - just as good as the others - Review of Art Hotel Batignolles, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: kebabs
title: 4th stay - just as good as the others
text:
Have just returned from our 4th stay at this hotel. We just love the location - quiet and calm but with great transport links to the city centre. Bars/restaurants are close by (3 within 2 minutes walk, others within 5.) We were given our favourite room - 303- which is small but perfect for us.
The front desk staff are all lovely, Vanessa remembered us from our last visit and gave us a warm welcome. I'm sure my schoolgirl French was appreciated but if yours is a bit rusty don't worry. She speaks good English, as do the others.
All in all a great stay: "grâce à Dieu" - we hope to return.
